androidx.leanback.widget

Class ScaleFrameLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • androidx.leanback.widget.ScaleFrameLayout

  • public class ScaleFrameLayout
extends FrameLayout
    Subclass of FrameLayout that support scale layout area size for children.
